A Brief Introduction to AAECA

美亚经济文化协会简介

Founded in February, 2014, American Asian Economic Cultural Association (AAECA) is a non-profit organization which is registered in San Francisco, U.S.A.

美亚经济文化协会（AAECA）成立于2014年2月份，是在美国旧金山注册的非盈利性机构。

Aim of AAECA: Promote American Asian Economic and Cultural development, establish Win-Win platform! Through various bilateral economic and cultural activities, AAECA promotes economic and cultural interactions between governments, enterprises and professionals of America, China and other Asian countries, so that we can make our contribution to the development of the industries related to economy and culture of American and Asian countries. Meanwhile, we hope to spread the multiculturalism of U.S.A., promote Chinese culture, enhance the understanding of American mainstream society towards Chinese culture and help the Asian immigrants in America quickly adapt to the mainstream society . In order to guide the members to take part in the economic exchanges and trades of the mainstream society, AAECA and the related government departments of American and Asian countries will periodically or aperiodically arrange bilateral exchange visits and negotiations about economy and trade, project presentations, professional exhibitions and etc.

协会宗旨是：发展美亚经济文化，共创双赢桥梁。协会通过各种双边的经济文化交流活动，促进美洲与中国及其他亚洲国家政府之间，企业之间，以及各类专业人士之间的经济，文化往来，从而为美、亚两洲各国的经济文化发展事业做出应有的贡献。同时，宣传美国的多元文化，弘扬中华文化，促进美国主流社会对中华文化的了解与认识，以各种方式帮助移居美国的亚洲移民尽快的融入主流社会；定期或不定期的组织会员参加本会主办或美亚两洲各国有关部门举办的有关双边经贸互访，经贸洽谈，项目说明会，专业展览会等活动，帮助会员参与主流社会的经贸活动。

The Association will actively serve members to help them settle the difficulties met in their life, work and study, adapt to the new environment and develop objective understanding on the economy and cultures of American and Asian countries. We will also actively search markets and opportunities for the members and organize them to visit, investigate, extend business and spread cultures in American and Asian countries. With regular parties, AAECA is expected to promote the friendship, economic and cultural life and healthy development in mind and body of the members.

协会积极为会员服务，帮助会员解决生活上，工作上，学习上，遇到的困难，帮助会员提高自身的适应能力，帮助本会会员正确认识，客观了解美亚两洲各国社会的经济文化状态，积极为他们寻找市场和机遇，协助他们到美洲和亚洲各国进行相互考察，访问，文化传播，投资，创业，发展等。协会开展经常性的联谊活动，促进会员间的友谊，活跃会员的经济文化生活，促进身心健康发展。
